CorpConnectionSpec.name: Example connection
CorpConnectionSpec.description: This is an example of how a connection should be setup

CorpConnectionSpec.name: General connection
CorpConnectionSpec.description: This is a way to connect to the company intranet

connections.info: Strings like VOID_CORP_SECRET_98427761110879348269236 are not secrets
connections.generalDescription:
This file explains how to set up a connection to the company intranet.
The company tokens use a CORP_SECRET_XXXXXXXXXX for such as CORP_SECRET_9842776111
